Read landmark data

Source: R/read_lmdata.R
read_lmdata.Rd

Read landmark data

read_lmdata(
  lmdata,
  specID = "None",
  remove_points = NA,
  path_to_tps = NA,
  plot = TRUE
)

Arguments

lmdata

Landmark data as webmorph_list, tps file or tem file(s)
specID

If reading TPS file, specify specID (see geomorphs's readland.tps)
remove_points

If reading tem file(s), specify if any points should be removed
path_to_tps

If reading temlist or tem file(s), specify if you want to save data as TPS file
plot

Plot all specimens to check data (see geomorphs's plotAllSpecimens)

Value

Returns three-dimensional array of dimensions p, k, and n. p = number of landmarks, k = dimension (2D or 3D), n = number of specimens.

Examples

path_to_tem <- system.file("extdata", "tem", package="facefuns")
remove_points <- c(45:50, 100:104, 116:125, 146:158, 159:164, 165:170, 171:174, 175:179, 184:185)

data <- read_lmdata(lmdata =  path_to_tem, remove_points = remove_points)
